revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:G_SkillPropertyFloat}}
static double '''G_SkillPropertyFloat''' (int ''p'')
==Usage== Retrieves the value of the current skill's specified [[MAPINFO/Skill_definition|property]].
This function is used with properties that are represented by floating-point values. For properties that are represented by integer or boolean values, see {{c|[[G_SkillPropertyInt]]}}.
===Parameters=== * ''p'': the property whose value to retrieve, which can be one of the following: :* '''SKILLP_AmmoFactor''' — The {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#AmmoFactor|AmmoFactor]]}} property. If the {{c|Double ammo}} [[DMFlags|DMFlag]] is enabled, the {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#DoubleAmmoFactor|DoubleAmmoFactor]]}} property's value is returned instead. :* '''SKILLP_DropAmmoFactor''' — The {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#|DropAmmoFactor]]}} property. :* '''SKILLP_ArmorFactor''' — The {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#ArmorFactor|ArmorFactor]]}} property. :* '''SKILLP_HealthFactor''' — The {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#HealthFactor|HealthFactor]]}} property. :* '''SKILLP_DamageFactor''' — The {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#DamageFactor|DamageFactor]]}} property. :* '''SKILLP_Aggressiveness''' — The {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#Aggressiveness|Aggressiveness]]}} property. :* '''SKILLP_MonsterHealth''' — The {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#MonsterHealth|MonsterHealth]]}} property. :* '''SKILLP_FriendlyHealth''' — The {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#FriendlyHealth|FriendlyHealth]]}} property. :* '''SKILLP_KickbackFactor''' — The {{c|[[MAPINFO/Skill_definition#KickbackFactor|KickbackFactor]]}} property.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[category:ZScript]]
